name: Bronzong
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

poke_body.name: Cursed Alloy
poke_body.effect: As long as Bronzong is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers between turns.

attacks.name: Pain Amplifier
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon that already has damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Coating
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Bronzong by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
